text: Cameron Polson (born 11 March 1998) is an Australian rules footballer playing for the Carlton Football Club in the Australian Football League (AFL). Polson was born in Hong Kong. He was drafted by Carlton with their fourth selection and fifty-ninth overall in the 2016 national draft. He made his debut in the ninety point loss against at the Adelaide Oval in round five of the 2017 season. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Carlton Football Club players Category:Sandringham Dragons players Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia)
title: Cameron Polson
